mapper.sql: id, code, name, close_date, close_price, close_rate_Percent, close_pb, close_pe, close_ps, close_total_value, create_time, update_time, type, flag, description
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from tb_history_data
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_history_data (id, code, name, close_date, close_price, close_rate_Percent, close_pb, close_pe, close_ps, close_total_value, create_time, update_time, type, flag, description ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closeRatePercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closePb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closePe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closePs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closeTotalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into tb_history_data
id,
code,
name,
close_date,
close_price,
close_rate_Percent,
close_pb,
close_pe,
close_ps,
close_total_value,
create_time,
update_time,
type,
flag,
description,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{closeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{closePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT close_price FROM ( SELECT close_price, create_time FROM tb_history_data WHERE CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 5 ) t ORDER BY create_time ASC
mapper.update:
update tb_history_data
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
close_date = #{record.closeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
close_price = #{record.closePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
close_rate_Percent = #{record.closeRatePercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
close_pb = #{record.closePb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
close_pe = #{record.closePe,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
close_ps = #{record.closePs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
close_total_value = #{record.closeTotalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_history_data set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, close_date = #{record.closeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, close_price = #{record.closePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, close_rate_Percent = #{record.closeRatePercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, close_pb = #{record.closePb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, close_pe = #{record.closePe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, close_ps = #{record.closePs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, close_total_value = #{record.closeTotalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_history_data
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
close_date = #{closeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
close_price = #{closePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
close_rate_Percent = #{closeRatePercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
